column4: Upon plugging in my usb hard drive, I hear the drive spin up, but no device entry appears
Yes it is, but here's my syslog via the file...
I'm pretty sure dmesg just dumps syslog directly.
OK, well, I gave you the output from syslog as well
have you tried it in a different port
it looks like the port is locked/resetting
Yes, I've tried all three ports on my laptop
do they all preset that error, but with the port address changing ?
looks like either your usb bus is not supported or hung, has it ever worked ?
My usb has worked, this device has not worked before, just got it.
